snippet: A New York Times/CBS News poll has found that American Catholics had less positive views of the leadership of Pope Benedict XVI than of Pope John Paul II.
lead_paragraph: A New York Times/CBS News poll has found that American Catholics had less positive views of the leadership of Pope Benedict XVI than of Pope John Paul II.

headline.seo: In Poll, U.S. Catholics Mixed on Benedict’s Papacy
headline.main: U.S. Catholics Give Mixed Reviews of Benedict’s Papacy
